_xResult.title: We Didn't Start the Fire Cocktail Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Fabulous custom red dress for day to evening wear
_xResult.longdesc:
Fabulous red dress for day to evening wear, pairs beautifully with many combinations of accessories. Evolving the classics and finding fresh ways with beautiful heritage fabrics is what we are really live to do. Beautiful dress with a structured silhouette, soft square neckline, and the half-sleeves with slits. Beautiful as cocktail, prom, bridesmaid or mother of the bride dress! '

  • Deep square neck
  • Fitted pencil silhouette
  • Knee length
  • Fully lined with viscose fabric
  • 3/4 sleeves with slits
  • Front slit on the skirt
  • Fiber: 60 % viscose, 36 % polyamide, 4 % elastane (lining: 95 % viscose, 5 % elastane)

Color: red coral

Hidden zipper on the back

Unless otherwise specified, length will be knee length as shown. Example, as shown: length- 40,0 ” (102 cm) Our model wears size S (US 6) and is 171cm/5'6" tall.
